Title: The King and the Council
Description:
I am glad you are here, $n. I have been using my dream brew to experience events around the world, but the more I learn, the more confused I become.

For instance, King Wrynn has asked the dwarves of Ironforge for more troops, but they do not all support him.

I will tell you more, but I would also like to hear from your experience firsthand...
ObjectivesText: Complete the "Blood in the Snow" scenario. You can queue from the Dungeon Finder or use Lorewalker Cho's Dream Brew.
